name: Covid-19 Tracker
description: A platform for COVID-19 live data visualizations. It is a frontend application build in React, utilizing MaterialUI.
keywords: Keywords: ReactJs, React hooks, Leaflet, Chart.js

name: Netflix clone
description: A netflix clone allowing users to discover a wide range of movies and display trailers. This project helped me improve my skills in advanced React concepts. In fact, I learned how to properly manipulate React hooks and improved my styling skills. I also used Eslint and Prettier to make sure that the code is clean and maintanable.

name: Ydoozy:  Online Courses search engine
description: It is an e-learning management platform with a progress tracking dashboard for Career Boosting. My work included the database and architecture design and implementation of the fullstack application from scratch following a given UI/UX design. This application's services are dedicated to 2 types of users according to their level of access to the app: learners to manage their training and track their progress and administrators to manage users, courses and careers.
keywords: Keywords: ReactJS, Postman, Git, Node JS (Express JS, Mongoose), MongoDb, MongoDb Atlas, Heroku
